/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with power lines and street lamps, adding a touch of urban charm. On the right side of the street, there's a construction site, indicating ongoing development in the area. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the greenery on the left side of the street.
